name: The Magic Book (StarshipCaptainBecca)
description:
: This game was made for the Narrative Driven Jam #11. Main theme: ANACHRONISM - We used a cell phone in a medieval castle.

We used all 3 optional themes: STRATEGY - this is a point-and-click strategy/puzzle game, BESTIES - the story involves two best friends, DEUS EX MACHINA - you'll see this if you beat the game!

Controls: Use mouse to walk, talk, interact with objects, and collect items. Inventory button opens/closes inventory. Click on phone to use it.  Drag items from inventory to use them on other objects in the game.

NOTE: If you have difficulty playing, make sure your browser and Windows settings are not zoomed in. Set both at 100%, it should work properly.

Credits:

StarshipCaptainBecca - game development and design, writing, art, animation

Rainsong - character walk animation

Grimfold - narrator voicing

Sound credits:
